template.name: User Profile

img.t-att-src: ('data:image/' + ('jpeg' if partner.logo_image_name.endswith('.jpeg') or partner.logo_image_name.endswith('.jpg') else 'png') + ';base64,' + partner.logo_image.decode('utf-8'))

li.span: The supplier must be both a registered user and a subscriber on Trademeda to participate in the Ready to buy program.
The supplier must commit to not requiring any lead time for manufacturing, since the product is already produced and available for immediate purchase.

div.p: Payment Terms: Cash in Advance Letter of Credit Documentary Collection Open Account Advance Payment Consignment Cash on Delivery (COD) Payment in Installments Bill of Exchange Telegraphic transfer

Shipping Terms: FOB (Free on Board) FCA (Free Carrier) EXW (Ex Works) FAS (Free Alongside Ship) DAP (Delivered at Place) DAT (Delivered at Terminal) CIF (Cost, Insurance and Freight) CIP (Carriage and Insurance Paid to) CFR (Cost and Freight) DDP (Delivery Duty Paid) CPT (Carriage paid to)
